name: Royal Longsword

refinement_effect.refine_one: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 10%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 12%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 14%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

description: An old longsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. Exquisitely crafted, the carvings and embellishments testify to the stature of its owner.
